item.title: 独家 | 中国电缆巨头将目光投向欧洲工厂，瞄准海上风电
item.description: 工厂可建立 ZTT，以利用北海国家计划在 2050 年前部署的数百兆瓦海上风力涡轮机【原文：Factory could set up ZTT to tap into hundreds of gigawatts of offshore wind turbines North Sea nations aim to deploy by 2050】

item.title: 德意志银行对西门子歌美飒扭亏为盈作出判断，股票大涨
item.description: 德国能源技术巨头西门子能源公司的风力涡轮机部门上周宣布大幅削减其陆上风电业务【原文：Wind turbine unit of German energy tech giant Siemens Energy announced last week sharp slimming of its onshore wind business】

item.title: 负电价的零点教训
item.description: 北欧引领了一种市场现象，这种现象现在已成为整个欧洲的问题，迫使电力买卖双方重新思考如何进行交易【原文：The Nordics led the way into a market phenomenon that's now an issue across Europe, forcing power buyers and sellers to rethink how they make deals】

item.title: 我们远远没有进入 "电气时代"。我们缺少的是
item.description: 国际能源机构的三项主要研究结果表明，我们离 "电力时代 "还有多远--我们必须满足三个条件才能说我们已经进入了这个时代【原文：Three key findings in the International Energy Agency's show just how far we are from The Age of Electricity – and three conditions must be met before we can say we've entered it】

item.title: Envision 签订协议，设想在欧洲部署涡轮机
item.description: 中国风力涡轮机和电池巨头签订协议，计划在整个非洲大陆部署其成套设备【原文：Chinese wind turbine and battery giant enters pact that envisages deployment of its kit across the continent】

item.title: 西门子 Gamesa 在海上发电推动增长的同时，为陆上发电制定了纤细的未来规划
item.description: 风力涡轮机 OEM 正在大幅削减陆上业务的平台、市场和工厂基地，但认为海上业务仍大有可为【原文：Wind turbine OEM is sharply reducing the platforms, markets and factory base for its land-based business but sees continuing promise at sea】

item.title: Cadeler 首席执行官：风能开发商仍然 "非常愿意 "为合适的船只付费
item.description: Cadeler 一直在投资先进的风力涡轮机船，以提高涡轮机和地基安装作业的规模和效率。【原文：Cadeler has been investing in advanced wind turbine vessels to boost the scale and efficiency of installation operations for turbines and foundations.】

item.title: 报告发现两人在风力发电场为救同事不幸身亡
item.description: 一名工人进入积聚一氧化碳的风力涡轮机地基坑窒息而死，随后两名同事奋力营救，三名工人在现场死亡【原文：Three workers died at site after one went into wind turbine foundation pit where carbon monoxide had accumulated and suffocated, followed by two desperate rescue efforts from colleagues】

item.title: 丹麦重新启动海上风电招标，法律威胁蒙上阴影
item.description: 丹麦重启去年失败的招标，但在陆上可再生能源开发商的威胁挑战下，"差价合约 "支持计划面临法律风险【原文：Denmark reboots last year’s failed tender but Contracts for Difference support scheme faces legal jeopardy amid threatened challenge from onshore renewables developers】

item.title: 西门子歌美飒为何与丹麦 Nvidia 超级计算机合作
item.description: 德国制造商表示，除其他优势外，Gefion 超级计算机将使其能够在 "数分钟内 "而不是 "数天内 "对风电场进行分析。【原文：German manufacturer says Gefion supercomputer will allow it to analyse wind farms in ‘minutes instead of days’ among other benefits】

item.title: GB 能源公司支持的项目表明，CIP 希望在扩大浮动风力发电规模方面占据领先地位
item.description: 丹麦基础设施融资商也是奥西恩项目的共同开发商，该项目有望成为首个获得全面规划许可的千兆级浮动风电场项目。【原文：Danish infrastructure financier is also co-developer of the Ossian project, firmly on course to become the first gigascale floating wind farm project to obtain full planning consent】

item.title: GB 能源公司支持的项目表明，CIP 希望在扩大浮动风力发电规模方面占据领先地位
item.description: 丹麦基础设施融资商也是奥西恩项目的共同开发商，该项目有望成为首个获得全面规划许可的千兆级浮动风电场项目。【原文：Danish infrastructure financier is also co-developer of the Ossian project, firmly on course to become the first gigascale floating wind farm project to obtain full planning consent】

item.title: 陆上开发商认为丹麦必须放弃海上风电补贴计划的四个原因
item.description: 丹麦开发商 Eurowind 和 European Energy 认为，拟议的海上风电场支持计划将 "悲剧性地、讽刺性地 "削弱陆上可再生能源【原文：Danish developers Eurowind and European Energy argue proposed offshore wind farm support scheme will 'tragically and ironically' undercut onshore renewables】

item.title: 陆上开发商认为丹麦必须放弃海上风电补贴计划的四个原因
item.description: 丹麦开发商 Eurowind 和 European Energy 认为，拟议的海上风电场支持计划将 "悲剧性地、讽刺性地 "削弱陆上可再生能源【原文：Danish developers Eurowind and European Energy argue proposed offshore wind farm support scheme will 'tragically and ironically' undercut onshore renewables】

item.title: 丹麦海上风电补贴可能带来 "灾难性 "后果，陆上开发商发出警告
item.description: 丹麦开发商 Eurowind 和 European Energy 认为，拟议中的海上风电场支持计划将 "悲剧性地、讽刺性地 "削弱陆上可再生能源。【原文：Danish developers Eurowind and European Energy argue proposed offshore wind farm support scheme will 'tragically and ironically' undercut onshore renewables】

item.title: Iberdrola 批评 RWE 在海上风电争论中提出 "不准确、离奇 "的说法
item.description: 苏格兰电力公司（ScottishPower）的子公司伊伯德罗拉公司（Iberdrola）对德国 RWE 公司在英国北海两个计划项目的唤醒效应争议中提出的索赔进行反驳【原文：Iberdrola subsidiary ScottishPower rails at claims made by Germany's RWE in dispute over wake effects concerning two planned projects in UK North Sea】

item.title: 金风科技计划新建工厂，加大对欧洲竞争对手的压力
item.description: 迄今为止，土耳其市场一直由德国供应商 Enercon 和 Nordex 主导，中国风力涡轮机制造商正努力加强在土耳其市场的地位【原文：Chinese wind turbine manufacturer moves to strengthen position in Turkish market that has until now been dominated by German suppliers Enercon and Nordex】

item.title: 英国凯尔特海浮式海上风电最后一轮租约授予
item.description: Ocean Winds 赢得第三份凯尔特海第 5 轮浮动风电租约，推动新兴产业发展【原文：Ocean Winds wins the third Celtic Sea Round 5 floating wind lease in boost to burgeoning sector】

item.title: Equinor 和当地巨头引发波兰海上风电招标的临界点
item.description: 挪威石油巨头与国内合作伙伴波兰电力公司（Polenergia）、公用事业公司 PGE 以及波兰炼油厂 Orlen 的海上风电部门现已全部获得波罗的海项目许可证，这些项目是拍卖的关键【原文：Norwegian oil giant with domestic partner Polenergia, utility PGE, and the offshore wind unit of Polish refiner Orlen have now all received permits for Baltic Sea projects that are key for auction】

item.title: GB 能源公司完成首个海上风电项目投资
item.description: 国家支持的可再生能源开发商与其他公共机构一道，支持苏格兰近海的彭特兰浮筒，以帮助启动该行业【原文：State-backed renewable energy developer joins other public bodies to back Pentland floater off Scotland in bid to help kick-start sector】

item.title: 陆上风电制造商利润上升--危机是否已经结束？
item.description: Nordex 和 Vestas 的净收入不断增加，而 Siemens Gamesa 和 Enercon 则有望实现收支平衡，但每家涡轮机生产商都面临着各自的问题【原文：Nordex and Vestas are posting rising net income while Siemens Gamesa and Enercon are on path to breaking even, but every turbine producer is facing own issues】

item.title: 丹麦海上风电支持争端升级，开发商威胁欧盟将采取法律行动
item.description: 陆上风电场开发商认为，对海上项目的支持有可能扭曲市场，破坏无补贴的可再生能源【原文：Onshore wind farm developers argue that support for offshore projects risks distorting the market and undermining unsubsidised renewables】

item.title: 让明阳进来| 关于中国风机的决定悬而未决
item.description: 阿德代尔港的支持者们正在寻找好消息，因为第一阶段的开发工作已提前完成，而且低于预算。【原文：Ardersier Port's backers are looking for some good news after delivered first-phase development ahead of schedule and under budget】

item.title: 全球海上风电投资骤降，但陆上风电投资再创新高
item.description: 国际可再生能源机构的报告指出，海上风电场的开发因陆上风电场普遍存在的问题而受到更严重的冲击，这些问题包括审批速度较慢和成本较高。【原文：Offshore wind farm development was hit harder by problems common to onshore sector due to slower permitting and higher costs, finds International Renewable Energy Agency report】

item.title: 未来五年推动风能成本下降的三个因素Rystad Energy
item.description: 资深分析师指出未来五年海上风电成本下降的趋势【原文：Senior analyst points to the trends that will make offshore wind costs fall in the next five years】

item.title: 道达尔能源为何与足球大亨达成 60 亿美元电力交易
item.description: 石油巨头表示，与捷克亿万富翁丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）在天然气和电池领域的合作使其能够在价值链的各个环节赚钱--无论是否刮风【原文：Oil giant says gas and batteries linkup with Czech billionaire Daniel Kretinsky lets it make money right along the value chain – whether or not the wind is blowing】

item.title: 德国联盟协议揭示未来风能和太阳能招标量
item.description: 弗里德里希-梅尔茨总理的基督教民主党和他们的社会民主党盟友就发电厂战略达成一致，以便在阳光或风力不足的日子里提供备用发电能力【原文：Chancellor Friedrich Merz’s Christian Democrats and their Social Democratic allies agree on power plant strategy to provide back-up capacity for days of little sun or wind】

item.title: How to enhance offshore wind farm security – and what it will cost
item.description: Aegir Insights’ modelling shows the cost of integrating advanced surveillance and defense systems into offshore wind farms that could find themselves increasing targets of grey zone warfare

item.title: Orsted 将海上风电安装技术商业化，可能有助于中标
item.description: 开发商称，低噪音替代方案采用喷射法安装近海风力涡轮机的单桩，可将水下噪音降至略高于北海自然背景的水平【原文：Low noise alternative uses jetting method for installation of monopiles for offshore wind turbines that reduces underwater noise to level just above natural background in North Sea, developer claims】

item.title: 明阳首席执行官："我们可以承担欧洲竞争对手不会承担的风能风险
item.description: 独家：明阳副总裁谈苏格兰工厂计划、中国供应商能提供欧洲竞争对手难以提供的服务，以及如何促进浮动部门发展，使所有人受益【原文：EXCLUSIVE: Mingyang vice president discusses plan for Scottish factory, what the Chinese supplier can offer that European rivals struggle to, and how it can boost floating sector to benefit of all】
